message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob! What do you say?
I'll take 80% now, you can have 20% for now, but you'll get more if we play more rounds.
Better deal for me this time, Bob! 60/40 split. What do you say?
I'll take 90% now, you'll get 10% and we can negotiate more later, but the value of the money is decreasing!
Middle ground, Bob! 55/45 split. Let's meet in the middle.
I'll take almost all the money now, you'll get a tiny bit, but it's still worth something!
I'm getting desperate, Bob! 70/30 split. Give me a chance to get something decent.
I'm taking almost all the money, you'll get a tiny fraction, but it's better than nothing at this point!
Last chance, Bob! 50/50 split. Let's end this fairly.
